Trade/Device Name(s): Safety Blood Collection Sets for Single Use
Submitter Information: Anhui Hongyu Wuzhou Medical Manufacturer Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for single-use safety blood collection sets with safety shield for venous blood collection
Indications for Use Summary: Used together with blood collection tube or syringe for collection of venous blood; winged needle with safety shield aids in protection against accidental needle stick injury following blood collection
